verb: an action **** tells what action a subject is performing, has performed, or will perform.
grammar: the whole system and structure of a language
opportunity: a set of circumstances that make it possible to do something
pursue: to follow or chase someone or something in order to attack them
achieve: to accomplish or bring about something
magnificent: being impressively beautiful, elaborate or striking
category: a class or division of people or things regarded as having certain characteristics
conquer: overcome and take control of a place or people by use of military force
